divs: Sighting Details Well it was in the 70;s.My boyfriend and I were parking, in pine gleen management area out side of Fort McCllean Alabama.We were in the woods in his truck.All of a sudden;; a bright light was on top of his truck,we were so scared.We then thought it was a game wardens truck above us on top of the hill.Then we left not saying a word .On the way home we noticed the time,we had been out there 4 hours,we never stayed there ever that long before,and we had light red on our face,we thought it was from kissing each orther.Days later i realised my face was still red his too.We decided not to tell anyone about this,your mind has a way of blocking out strange things.I never told anyone about this till now i could not.I never knew if he did or not,but i will never go back there again.I am older now and i can talk more about it now i watch the skies and pray it want come back.I do know this for sure,if someone really does see a ufo they will not woant to talk about it till years later, if ever, your mind cant handle it, Cathy;;;; .
Summary: Big bright light on top of truck
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Anniston
There were no other sightings in Anniston on or around April 15th 1971
